https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/utcDxfjqqSqGCLZUDJC28vIoT3.jpg Bagavathi, a tea vendor, has big dreams for his younger brother, Guna. However, when Guna's girlfriend's father kills him, Bagavathi must fight to protect Guna's unborn child. Bagavathi
